description: ff. 14. 245 x 168; 145 x 78 mm. 18-22 lin. autograph; on last fol. the authorʼs seal and autogr. ijāzah for ḥasan ibn Ṭāhā al-Ṣābūnī al-ḥalabī, n.d. Probably same as Brockelmann, GAL, S II, 776 (10: no. 8). Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى ارشد السالکىن ... اما بعد فىقول ... لما کانت معرفة الله واجبة
author: Qāwuqjī, Muḥammad ibn Khalīl, 1809 or 10-1887 or 8.
creator: Qāwuqjī, Muḥammad ibn Khalīl, 1809 or 10-1887 or 8.
